description:
Shinomiya Utai (aka. Ardor Maiden) is a Level 7 linker with element of fire. She`s a forth-grader attending Matsunoki Elementary. Her avatar - Ardor Maiden, has a Japanese priestess-like figure and has the ability to purify objects with parasitic attributes, she also possesses a powerful wide range Incarnate System ability, however it takes a long time to activate due to its complexity.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shinomiya Utai
